review: Easy set up. Better than expected, everything as promised.
author: sr800

review: It works, but it should have been free.  Despite all of the publicity about the huge number of films available to prime members, most films are not free.  The Amazon fire stick is really  a convenient catalog of all the Amazon films you can rent or buy from Amazon.
author: Durham

review: The first Fire Stick we received was a dud and stopped working after about 10 minutes of use. We contacted Amazon customer service, they were great and made everything right... we received a replacement in 2 days and the second one has worked wonderfully. The interface is much better than the system that came included on our TV (it's a Vizio). It's very easy to navigate and search different shows. I also love the ability to access our own videos and music.
author: Kimaloo

review: BEST INVESTMENT MADE I CUT MY CABEL BILL DONT NEED ANYTHING ELSE
author: RAMON

review: Was better than what i expected.
author: Deloris

review: Well worth the money.  Integrated seamlessly. Needs a longer power cord
author: Edward W Gerard

review: Cheap enough but not the best streaming device that I have owned. It buffers for ever.
author: James Harding
